trans-unit.source: Specifies the action that occurs when an exception escapes the root of a workflow.
trans-unit.target: Especifica a ação que ocorre quando uma exceção escapes a raiz de um fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A> function is invoked if an exception escapes the root of the workflow.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A>função é invocada se uma exceção escapes a raiz do fluxo de trabalho.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationUnhandledExceptionEventArgs> provides access to the exception as well as a pointer to the <xref:System.Activities.Activity> that generated the exception.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationUnhandledExceptionEventArgs>fornece acesso a exceção, bem como um ponteiro para o <xref:System.Activities.Activity>que gerou a exceção.</xref:System.Activities.Activity> </xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplicationUnhandledExceptionEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Terminate is the default action if no <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A> handler is specified.
trans-unit.target: Terminar é a ação predefinida se não <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A>é especificado um processador.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"></xref> should abort the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"> </xref> deve abortar o fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: This results in <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Aborted%2A> being called when the abort process is complete.
trans-unit.target: Isto resulta em <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Aborted%2A>que está a ser chamado quando o processo de abortar está concluído.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Aborted%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unhandled exception is used as the abort reason.
trans-unit.target: A exceção não processada é utilizada como o motivo de abortar.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"></xref> should schedule the cancellation of the root activity and resume execution.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"> </xref> deve agendar o cancelamento da atividade raiz e retomar a execução.

trans-unit.source: This results in <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A> being called when the cancellation process is complete.
trans-unit.target: Isto resulta em <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A>que está a ser chamado quando o processo de cancelamento é concluído.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A>

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"></xref> should schedule termination of the root activity and resume execution.
trans-unit.target: Especifica que o <xref href="System.Activities.WorkflowApplication"> </xref> deve agendar terminação da atividade raiz e retomar a execução.

trans-unit.source: This results in <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A> being called when the termination process is complete.
trans-unit.target: Isto resulta em <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A>que está a ser chamado quando o processo de cessação está concluído.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.Completed%2A>

trans-unit.source: The unhandled exception is used as the termination reason.
trans-unit.target: A exceção não processada é utilizada como o motivo de terminação.

trans-unit.source: Terminate is the default action if no <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A> handler is specified.
trans-unit.target: Terminar é a ação predefinida se não <xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A>é especificado um processador.</xref:System.Activities.WorkflowApplication.OnUnhandledException%2A>
